title: Do people actually think saying "reported" will stop someone leaving?
body: I would have thought if they want to leave, they no longer care about being reported or any consequences. Why do others insist on screaming "reported" when I decide to leave a game?

replies.body: why are you leaving games in the first place? reported.
Because you don't leave a game until its done
They're just letting you know they're going to report you to the non-existent tribunal.
If someone says reported  do what they're reporting me, 9/10 they break and spew swear words then I report them for verbal abuse and they get chat restricted.
